content.query:
SELECT Category, 
       (XS * 100.0) / (Free + XS + S + M + L + XL + XXL + "3XL" + "4XL" + "5XL" + "6XL") AS XS_Percentage,
       (S * 100.0) / (Free + XS + S + M + L + XL + XXL + "3XL" + "4XL" + "5XL" + "6XL") AS S_Percentage,
       (M * 100.0) / (Free + XS + S + M + L + XL + XXL + "3XL" + "4XL" + "5XL" + "6XL") AS M_Percentage
FROM size_sales_quantity;
